name: recalculate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to calculate something again: The bank will recalculate the amount of interest you should be paying. NASA re-calculated the asteroid's orbit.
More examplesFewer examplesThe firm was forced to recalculate its earnings.Once you go off route, the app doesn't automatically recalculate a new one.The panel had approved re-calculating the tax every three months.Many mortgage providers re-calculate the balance owed daily.The spreadsheet will automatically recalculate a quantity when one of the variables in a formula is changed.
